#summary quick tips if it isn't working for you

=== Details of Movies / TV Episodes ===

In order to view details of movies and TV show episodes I make use of 2 JSON methods (`GetMovieDetails` and `GetEpisodeDetails`) that were not part of the Dharma release of xbmc. They are in the latest xbmc source code which is now hosted at https://github.com/xbmc/xbmc.
